select product_order_seq_product_order_no.nextval from dual
insert into PRODUCT_ORDER (product_order_no,member_no,address_no,product_order_total_price,product_order_date) values (#{productOrderNo},#{memberNo},#{addressNo},#{productOrderTotalPrice},#{productOrderDate})
mapper.select: select po.product_order_no, po.product_order_total_price, po.product_order_date, a.member_no, a.address_postcode, a.address_address, a.address_address_detail,pod.product_no, 'http://localhost:8081/api/v1/image/product?name=' || pi.product_image_filename as product_image, p.product_name, pod.product_order_detail_no, pod.product_order_detail_count, pod.product_order_detail_price, pod.product_order_detail_review_enabled from product_order po join product_order_detail pod on po.product_order_no = pod.product_order_no join address a on po.address_no = a.address_no join product p on pod.product_no = p.product_no join product_image pi on pod.product_no = pi.product_no and pi.PRODUCT_IMAGE_NO=1 where a.member_no = #{memberNo} order by po.product_order_date desc

select po.product_order_no, po.product_order_total_price, po.product_order_date, a.member_no, a.address_postcode, a.address_address, a.address_address_detail,pod.product_no, 'http://localhost:8081/api/v1/image/product?name=' || pi.product_image_filename as product_image, p.product_name, pod.product_order_detail_no, pod.product_order_detail_count, pod.product_order_detail_price from product_order po join product_order_detail pod on po.product_order_no = pod.product_order_no join address a on po.address_no = a.address_no join product p on pod.product_no = p.product_no join product_image pi on pod.product_no = pi.product_no and pi.PRODUCT_IMAGE_NO=1 where po.product_order_no = #{productOrderNo}
